EmailTemplate.name: Survey Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Friendly Reminder: Please take the time to respond to the Nissan Fleet Evaluation survey.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble reading this email? View the online version.
Dear {!Evaluation_Booking__c.Contact_First_Name__c},
We hope that you enjoyed your experience with the {!Evaluation_Booking__c.Vehicle_Name__c}. Further to the post evaluation survey request sent to you on the {!Evaluation_Booking__c.Survey_Confirmation_Sent_Date__c}, we would greatly appreciate it if you could take the time to provide feedback specific to your experience (this should take no more than 10 minutes).
Your feedback provides us with valuable information which enables us to improve our service to you.
You can find the link to your survey here.
With thanks, {!Evaluation_Booking__c.Created_By_Name__c}
